name: Duo
description: Duo is a single-player minimalist puzzle game where your objective is to make two characters meet each other using the scenario in your favor and preventing them from falling in the process.
minimum_requirements: Processor: Intel/AMD Dual Core 1,2Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphic card compatible with directx 9 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU  J1800  @ 2.41GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics (Intel Bay Trail) Storage: 300 MB available space
